COMMENT_TX: replay,1,fielp001,MIL,hirsj901,MIL06,O,N,I,,H $Prince Fielder's fly hit the top of the CF wall on the yellow stripe; the Brewers wanted a home run; crew chief John Hirschbeck watched the replay and confirmed the call on the field
ej,churr001,P,reybd901,Called third strike Pirates right fielder Ryan Church ejected by HP umpire D. J. Reyburn
ej,laroa002,P,reybd901,Called third strike Pirates third baseman Andy LaRoche ejected by HP umpire D. J. Reyburn
Brewers left fielder Ryan Braun left the game due to an injured elbow
$the 500th home run surrendered by Jamie Moyer, who is the second pitcher to do so; Robin Roberts surrendered 505 in his career
$Chase Utley's fly hit the padding on the RF wall, bounced off RF Corey Hart and over the fence for a double (rule 6.09g)
Brewers center fielder Jim Edmonds left the game due to an injured side
$Wilson Valdez called for interference

$after Brewers pitcher Todd Coffey threw his warm-up pitches, Mets manager Jerry Manuel talked to the umpires about Coffey's glove, which was deemed too light a color; the umpires told Coffey to change gloves before he could pitch
Giants pitcher Dan Runzler left the game due to an injured knee

$the ball struck 2B umpire Chris Guccione who was positioned on the infield in front of 2B; the ball was dead on the umpire interference, Lastings Milledge was awarded 1B and Garrett Jones placed back at 2B because he was not forced to advance
Brewers right fielder Corey Hart left the game due to an injured wrist
Brewers center fielder Jim Edmonds left the game due to an injured foot
$Jay Bruce beat the high throw but slid past the bag and was tagged out

ej,fielp001,P,dimum901,Called third strike $Brewers first baseman Prince Fielder objected to the called third strike but only said a few words; as he walked up the first base line, he threw his bat down and then slammed his helmet down; HP umpire Mike DiMuro, who was walking up the third base line, heard the noise, turned and ejected Fielder
$the seventh time a team has hit four consecutive home runs and the third time that one pitcher has surrendered all four; brothers J.D. and Stephen Drew have been part of three of the seven
Brewers right fielder Corey Hart left the game due to an injured leg
Padres catcher Yorvit Torrealba left the game due to an injured head
$the 21st career pinch homer for Matt Stairs, setting a new career record; he passed Cliff Johnson

ej,ethia001,P,johna901,Balls and strikes Dodgers right fielder Andre Ethier ejected by HP umpire Adrian Johnson from the bench; Ethier was yelling at Johnson about the strike zone, comparing calls to James Loney to his called third strike
Pirates pitcher Evan Meek left the game due to an injured hand

ej,machk101,M,timmt901,Call at 2B (interference) $Jonathan Lucroy scored from third on the double play but 2B umpire Tim Timmons ruled that Craig Counsell interfered with SS Tyler Greene when Counsell slid away from the bag without the ability to touch the base; Lucroy was returned to third; Brewers manager Ken Macha argued the call and was ejected by Timmons after gesturing to the ground near the second base bag
ej,duncd101,C,davib902,Balls and strikes $when the fourth pitch to Corey Hart was called a ball, Cardinals Pitching Coach Dave Duncan yelled from the dugout and was ejected by HP umpire Bob Davidson
ej,dickc001,P,davib902,Called third strike $Brewers left fielder Chris Dickerson threw his bat and helmet down at the plate after being called out on strikes; he was ejected by HP umpire Bob Davidson

$HP umpire Bob Davidson talked with park security people and had them remove a fan from behind home plate who had been yelling at Cardinals catcher Yadier Molina; in this game, the umpires ejected one manager, one coach, one player and one fan
$Trevor Hoffman's 600th career save; he is the first pitcher to reach this milestone
Debut game for Brandon Kintzler
Debut game for Mark Rogers
$Reds first baseman Jim Edmonds strained his right lower leg while rounding second running out his homer; he left the game due to the injury
fan interference
Brewers left fielder Chris Dickerson left the game due to an injured leg
fan interference
Reds pitcher Aaron Harang left the game due to an injured ankle
Brewers left fielder Ryan Braun left the game due to an injured elbow
Debut game for Sandy Rosario
Debut game for Steve Cishek
Brewers pitcher Chris Capuano left the game due to an injured groin
